name: space SHIP (Rami)
description:
A visual novel created for Global Game Jam 2020.

You take the role of an AI aboard a spacecraft. Your two pilots are fighting and the ship is damaged. You must get your two pilots to mend their relationship if you want to repair it before certain doom.

To fix the ship, you're going to have to "ship" your pilots. 

~~space SHIP~~

**This game was not 100% completed in time. What is presented currently is playable, and will be updated later.
